myself are the same person

so there are three situations usually
when we use reflexive pronouns I talked

the example of this is I hurt myself

I hurt myself

could also use reflexive pronouns when

words but let's understand it's really
pretty simple here's an example sentence
I bought a book for myself all right I

so here also because we have a
